value:
So, you've got a divine weapon too?
Looks like it's hard to aim. But it
really isn't for battle, is it?

My retainers are Hinata and Oboro.
They work hard, so I'm glad they
know how to relax.$k$pHonestly, I can't help spoiling
those two.

I heard you can't fight, so you can
count on me...no matter what
some people say behind my back.

I like the food of my homeland.
Especially miso soup. Maybe you and
I can cook something up like that.

I always keep my Fujin Yumi nice and
polished. I'm only as good as my
weapon. Best to keep it in top shape.

I'm here to give you a fine hello
from $Nf.$k$pNow, you be sure to stay in touch.

Phew! Nice growth! What a
relief.

All right. Not bad. Not bad
at all!
What? It happens!

Heh. Nice to see that you're really
taking an interest.

I'm Takumi, a prince of Hoshido and
wielder of the divine Fujin Yumi. Which
makes me pretty useful, I'd say.

I've been wondering... How do you
think of me? Am I just another
Hero to you?$k$pNot that it matters to me. Just
curious. But I feel like you
acknowledge me and my skill.$k$pIf you didn't, why would you spend
so much time looking out for me?
...I appreciate that, by the way.$k$pI guess that's all I ever wanted—
to be acknowledged for my own
abilities. Thank you.$k$pNow just you watch—I'll be the
strongest Hero you've ever
known.
せやっ！
Hit!
うわっ！
How dare you?
Oh, that's it!
Die already!
I'll shoot you down!
You'll never hit this target!
By you?!
Hmmm.
Must be nice to have free time. Ugh. Sorry, I didn't mean that.
I have nightmares that you wouldn't believe. I wish they'd go away.
Don't worry. I'll obliterate anyone who gets in our way!
Were you happy to see me when I showed up? Hope so.
I have to get stronger! Way stronger! More than my siblings, anyway.
Are Hinata and Oboro around? Not that I need them to relax or anything.
Heh, nice to be needed. But nice to get compliments too.
Yes?
On it.
Let's go.
Need me? All right. I'll help.
